title: Ranked bug
body: Hi Riot, there seems to be a ranked bug where you go to duo queue and it keeps kicking you out. Can you investigate this? Thanks

replies.body:
Could it be that you and your duo aren't within the range to be able to duo with each other?

What do you mean by "kicking you out"
So we click on find a game and it just kicks out as soon as you press play, Gold IV to silver V is too high do you think? could that be the cause? otherwise if not then I think its a bug

Are there any error messages or do you both just land back on the home page? 

Does the lobby persist or is it disbanded? 

Are you trying to play flex or solo/duo? 

Does the lobby break when your friend tries to join or when you try to queue?
